title: Maintenance of division of employment services offices
summary: Provides for maintenance of division of employment services offices.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3918

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 31, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of A. BRENNAN, ABBATE, PEOPLES-STOKES, MENG, JAFFEE,
         TITUS, COOK, CASTRO, BARRON, HOOPER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of  A.
         GOTTFRIED,  WEISENBERG  --  read once and referred to the Committee on
         Labor

       AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to maintenance of division of
         employment services offices

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  opening  paragraph of section 14 of the labor law is
    2  designated subdivision 1 and a new subdivision 2 is  added  to  read  as
    3  follows:
    4    2.  THE  DEPARTMENT  SHALL  MAINTAIN  DIVISION  OF EMPLOYMENT SERVICES
    5  OFFICES  WHICH  SHALL   PROVIDE   SERVICES   TO   THOSE   PERSONS   WITH
    6  EMPLOYMENT-RELATED  NEEDS,  INCLUDING,  BUT  NOT  LIMITED  TO, ACCEPTING
    7  APPLICATION FOR OR ASSISTING IN THE CONTINUING MAINTENANCE OF  UNEMPLOY-
    8  MENT INSURANCE BENEFITS. THERE SHALL BE AT LEAST ONE SUCH OFFICE IN EACH
    9  BOROUGH  OF  THE  CITY  OF  NEW YORK AND EACH COUNTY IN THE STATE WITH A
   10  POPULATION OF GREATER THAN 150,000 AS  DETERMINED  BY  THE  MOST  RECENT
   11  FEDERAL CENSUS.
   12    S  2. This act shall take effect on the first of January next succeed-
   13  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07735-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to maintenance of division of employment services offices
